name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole - The Videogame
name_original: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole - The Videogame
description:
Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole - The Videogame is an arcade game developed by Krome Studios and Tantalus Media. It was originally released in 2010. Warner Bros. Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole - The Videogame is available on Wii, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
